attributes.additional_details: The TV licence fee is not a licence, but an undemocratic subscription that is dictated to us the public to pay. Evan if you do not wish to use the BBC but watch other broadcasters we still have to pay this fee. How can this be fair in todays moden world. Being forced to pay for something you do not want.
attributes.background: To abolish the TV licence fee and make the BBC fund itself as other broadcasters have to.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition:

Abolish the TV licence and make the BBC a subscription channel: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649092
